context_script:
no_cache = 1
no_sitemap = 1


context.title = args.city
context.subtitle = "project"

context.project = "project"
name: conference
title: conference

context_script:
context.day = frappe.form_dict.day or '1'
args['day'] = context.day


talks = frappe.db.sql("SELECT t.* FROM `tabConference` c inner JOIN `tabConference Talks` t on c.name = t.parent  where c.city = %(city)s and c.year=%(year)s and t.day = %(day)s order by t.idx asc", args, as_dict=True )
context.days = frappe.db.sql("SELECT t.day FROM `tabConference` c inner JOIN `tabConference Talks` t on c.name = t.parent  where c.city = %(city)s and c.year=%(year)s group by t.day", args, as_dict=True )

hall1talks = []

for talk in talks:
    hall1talks.append(talk)


context.hall1talks = hall1talks

def make_talk(title, start_time="", end_time="", is_break=False): 
    return {
        "name": title, 
        "start_time": start_time,
        "end_time": end_time,
        "break": is_break
    }
    
def get_talk_time(talk):
    return talk['start_time']
name: conference-schedule
title: Conference Schedule
